name: Eira's Potions for the Lost
description:
Help lost souls to find themselves, by aiding them in their personnal struggles.

1- Talk to the ghost.
2- Pick up ingredients.
3- Pake your potion in the cauldron.
4- Give the ghost it's potion.
5- Repeat. There are 5 ghosts to help.

Controls : Move - WASD / Arrow Keys / Left Joystick
Action - Spacebar / one of the controller's face buttons

Made for GGJ2021.

Full credits in download.
